metoffice.title: Yellow warning of thunderstorm affecting South West England
metoffice.summary: Yellow warning of thunderstorm affecting South West England: Bath and North East Somerset, Bristol, Dorset, Gloucestershire, North Somerset, Somerset, South Gloucestershire, Swindon, Wiltshire valid from 1108 Sun 07 Sep to 1500 Sun 07 Sep

heat.text: Little impact observed on health, healthcare services and social care provision. Business as usual.

cold.text: Little impact observed on health, healthcare services and social care provision. Business as usual.
